alert.note: Alert for Animas River Basin; Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin; Four Corners, Upper Dolores River; Paradox Valley, Lower Dolores River; Upper Gunnison River Valley (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued June 26 at 2:24PM MDT until June 27 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 9 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...In Colorado, Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin, Upper Gunnison River Valley, Paradox Valley/Lower Dolores River, Four Corners/Upper Dolores River and Animas River Basin. In Utah, Southeast Utah. * WHEN...From 11 AM to 9 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down. Blowing dust will be possible.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. People, especially those with respiratory illnesses, heart disease, the elderly, and children are recommended to stay indoors and avoid prolonged outdoor exercise or heavy exertion due to wind-blown dust.

area.areaDesc: Animas River Basin; Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin; Four Corners, Upper Dolores River; Paradox Valley, Lower Dolores River; Upper Gunnison River Valley
